column4: hi this is my first time to use irc so if im asking in the wrong place sorry, please point me in the right direction, i need help authenticating ubuntu with windows NT/2000 server
Hi and welcome!  Not sure what you mean by "authenticating"?
Unfortunately that's out of my league.  There might be others here who know so it could be the right place.  Otherwise you might go better in a samba channel or mailing list.
I like how you included backup scripts in your post :)
